mapper.sql: PRODUCT_ID, VERSION, UUID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_VALUE, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, PRODUCT_FROM_ID, PRODUCT_TO_ID, PRODUCT_PRIORITY, AMT, DELETED_FLAG, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE1, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE2, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE3, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE4, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE5, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE6, PROCESS_STATUS, MAKER_ON, MAKER_BY, CHECKER_ON, CHECKER_BY, CREATE_ON, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_ON, MODIFY_BY, AUTHORIZER_BY, AUTHORIZER_ON
mapper.select:
SELECT product.PRODUCT_ID AS "productId", product.VERSION AS "version", product.UUID AS "uuid", product.PRODUCT_NAME AS "productName", product.PRODUCT_VALUE AS "productValue", product.PRODUCT_DESC AS "productDesc", product.PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS "productDetailId", product.AMT AS "amt", detail.PRODUCT_IMAGE_PATH AS "productImagePath" FROM lxy_product product LEFT JOIN lxy_product_detail detail ON product.PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID = detail.DETAIL_ID
AND version = #{version
AND uuid = #{uuid
mapper.insert: insert into lxy_product (PRODUCT_ID, VERSION, UUID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_VALUE, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, PRODUCT_FROM_ID, PRODUCT_TO_ID, PRODUCT_PRIORITY, AMT, DELETED_FLAG, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE1, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE2, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE3, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE4, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE5, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE6, PROCESS_STATUS, MAKER_ON, MAKER_BY, CHECKER_ON, CHECKER_BY, CREATE_ON, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_ON, MODIFY_BY, AUTHORIZER_BY, AUTHORIZER_ON ) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productFromId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productToId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAttribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{makerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorizerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorizerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update lxy_product
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_VALUE = #{productValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID = #{productDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_TYPE_ID = #{productTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_FROM_ID = #{productFromId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_TO_ID = #{productToId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_PRIORITY = #{productPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE1 = #{productAttribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE2 = #{productAttribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE3 = #{productAttribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE4 = #{productAttribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE5 = #{productAttribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE6 = #{productAttribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MAKER_BY = #{makerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKER_ON = #{checkerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECKER_BY = #{checkerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ON = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_ON = #{modifyOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIZER_BY = #{authorizerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIZER_ON = #{authorizerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update lxy_product set VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_VALUE = #{productValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID = #{productDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_TYPE_ID = #{productTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_FROM_ID = #{productFromId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_TO_ID = #{productToId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_PRIORITY = #{productPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE1 = #{productAttribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE2 = #{productAttribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE3 = #{productAttribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE4 = #{productAttribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE5 = #{productAttribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE6 = #{productAttribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAKER_ON = #{makerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAKER_BY = #{makerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKER_ON = #{checkerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER_BY = #{checkerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ON = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_ON = #{modifyOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHORIZER_BY = #{authorizerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHORIZER_ON = #{authorizerOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
